item.name: Exchange using AM policy with ssotoken (impersonation)
MS AuthN- client3 w/ exchange, introspect scopes

request.description:
Generated from a curl request: 
curl -k -u client3:client3 -H \"Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\" -X POST \"http://localhost:18080/service/access_token?grant_type=client_credentials\"

Generated from a curl request: 
curl -k \
    -d \"grant_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:token-exchange\" \
    -d \"resource=http://images.example.com:*/*\" \
    -d \"subject_token=$EX_SUBJECT_TOKEN\" \
    -d \"subject_token_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:token-type:access_token\" \
    -H \"Authorization: Bearer $EX_BEARER_TOKEN\" \
    -H \"Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\" \
    -X POST \"http://localhost:38080/service/tokensts\"

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Content-API-Version
header.description: Custom header

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

request.description:
Generated from a curl request: 
curl -k \
    -d \"grant_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:token-exchange\" \
    -d \"resource=http://images.example.com:*/*\" \
    -d \"subject_token=$EX_SUBJECT_TOKEN\" \
    -d \"subject_token_type=urn:ietf:params:oauth:token-type:access_token\" \
    -H \"Authorization: Bearer $EX_BEARER_TOKEN\" \
    -H \"Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded\" \
    -X POST \"http://localhost:38080/service/tokensts\"
